root.name: Icytomine Explorer
root.description:
Cytomine Client This plugins are compatible with Cytomine version 1 servers , NOT version 2 servers. Available plugins:
Project Explorer Image Viewer
Available protocol blocks:
Create Cytomine client Get Cytomine annotation Get Cytomine image Get Cytomine project Remove Cytomine annotation Send ROIs to Cytomine
Available batch blocks:
Cytomine annotation loop Cytomine annotation tiler Cytomine image loop Cytomine project loop
More information on Gitlab page
root.author: danyfel80 – Daniel Felipe González Obando
root.changelog:
- Version 1.0.5.0 Date 2022-09-23 00:00:00
Optimized user annotation geometry fetch (linking geometry with user annotation)
- Version 1.0.4.0 Date 2022-09-22 18:00:00
Fixed internal dependencies (may need more work)
- Version 1.0.3.0 Date 2022-09-22 12:00:00
- switched to develop branch (and merged in master to avoid futures mistakes), re-introducing recent changes. - cleaned up pom file, dependencies
- Version 1.0.2.0 Date 2022-08-24 15:00:00
Reverted to java client version 2.2.20 (2.3.0 has issue retrieving with pixel size information)
- Version 1.0.1.0 Date 2022-02-15 17:00:00
Updated to last version, fixed missing dependencies.
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2021-02-10 09:32:24
Unified client and batch plugins. Batch should be uninstalled for this plugin to work. Mavenized project and fix exception when opening the plugin
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2019-04-16 17:17:27
